title: Pinto
body: This surname comes from the family of Lopo Fernandes Pinto and Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado, both of noble descent. The first came to live in Madeira around the mid-15th century and died in 1500; the second started living on this island around 1500 and settled in Machico, where he passed away. Lopo Fernandes Pinto had sesmaria lands in Santana and in S. Jorge.

Lopo Fernandes Pinto: Resident in Madeira around the mid-15th century, deceased in 1500
Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado: Resident in Madeira around 1500, deceased in Machico

15th century: Lopo Fernandes Pinto came to live in Madeira
1500: Death of Lopo Fernandes Pinto and Gonçalo Pinto Alcoforado
